action.action-desc: Mr. Taylor introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act with respect to the scope of permits, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Confidence in Clean Water Permits Act.

subsection.text: Section 402(k) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (33 U.S.C. 1342(k)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking (k) Compliance with and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following:
For purposes of paragraph (1), compliance with the conditions of a permit issued under this section shall be considered compliance with respect to a discharge of—

subparagraph.text: any pollutant for which an effluent limitation is included in the permit; and
any pollutant for which an effluent limitation is not included in the permit that is—

clause.text: specifically identified as controlled or monitored through indicator parameters in the permit, the fact sheet for the permit, or the administrative record relating to the permit;
specifically identified during the permit application process as present in discharges to which the permit will apply; or
whether or not specifically identified in the permit or during the permit application process—

subclause.text: present in any waste streams or processes of the point source to which the permit applies, which waste streams or processes are specifically identified during the permit application process; or
otherwise within the scope of any operations of the point source to which the permit applies, which scope of operations is specifically identified during the permit application process.

subsection.text: Section 402(l)(3) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (33 U.S.C. 1342(l)(3)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking section 402 and inserting this section; and
by striking federal and inserting Federal; and
by striking Section and inserting section;
by striking 402(l)(3)(A), and inserting subparagraph (A),; and
by striking 402(l)(3)(A). and inserting such subparagraph..

subsection.header: Expression of water quality-Based effluent limitations
subsection.text: Section 402 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (33 U.S.C. 1342) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.header: Expression of water quality-Based effluent limitations
subsection.text: If the Administrator (or a State, in the case of a permit program approved by the Administrator) determines that a water quality-based limitation on a discharge of a pollutant is necessary to include in a permit under this section in addition to any appropriate technology-based effluent limitations included in such permit, the Administrator (or the State) may include such water quality-based limitation in such permit only in the form of a limitation that—

paragraph.text: specifies the pollutant to which it applies; and
clearly describes the manner in which compliance with the limitation may be achieved, which shall include—

subparagraph.text: a numerical limit on the discharge of such pollutant; or
a narrative description of required actions (including any measures or practices required to be applied).
